content: In this section, we consider the environmental impact of mining. See also our analysis of energy and greenhouse gas impacts of mining and of waste disposal challenges.

sections.name: Biodiversity Impacts
content: Mining takes an estimated 0.3-1.0% of the Earth's surface, though has a disproportionate impact of wildlife through long-lasting tailing pollution and acid mine drainage, which is the outflow of acidic water [iea_mining]. The impact generally grows with the amount of tailings the mine produces.
!Biodiversity impact of measured in MiBiD, which "is a non-dimensional index based on data regarding land cover, protected areas and mining operations". Source: IEA [iea_mining].

sections.name: Water Use and Pollution
content: Mining has a wide range of impacts of water use and pollution.
